plugin.name: Plugin Manager
plugin.description: The Plugin Manager is this plugin, that allows installation, update and removal of Notepad++ plugins. It will notify you of updates to plugins that you have installed, and automatically install dependencies and required files into the correct places.
plugin.author: Dave Brotherstone
plugin.latestUpdate: x64 support with a simple XML plugin list managed manually

plugin.name: NppFTP
plugin.description: NppFTP: a plugin that allows FTP, FTPS, FTPES and SFTP communications. Very useful for web development.
plugin.author: ashish_kulz
plugin.latestUpdate: - Fix for issue #122 about missing support for TLS V1.2 for FTPS and FTPES.\n- Build tooling preparation for cmake builds.

plugin.name: MIME Tools
plugin.description: Converts to and from Base64 as well as Quoted Printable formats. This is suitable to process texts from emails or to be emailed.
plugin.author: Don HO
plugin.latestUpdate: Remove the dependance of other dll

plugin.name: Converter
plugin.description: Converts selected text (hexadecimal string or ASCII string) to ASCII or hexadecimal string according your choice.
plugin.author: Don HO
plugin.latestUpdate: Remove the dependance of other dll
